select ma.id, ma.member_id, ma.charge_activity_id, ma.is_use, ma.use_date, m.mobile, ca.note, m.true_name, ca.activity_name from t_member_activity ma join t_member m on ma.member_id = m.id join t_charge_activity ca on ma.charge_activity_id = ca.id
m.is_valid=1
AND ma.member_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query.memberId},'%')
AND ma.is_use LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query.isUse},'%')
AND m.mobile LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query.mobile},'%')
AND ca.note LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query.note},'%')
AND m.true_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query.trueName},'%')
ORDER BY ca.create_date
